short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion extension needed for the histreams.net to work properly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi Streams Extension - A helpful extension which enables ton of extra features to the site.
Without this extension, the website won't fulfill its' greatest potential!

Features:

Seamless Cross-Domain Access: The extension provides users with a hassle-free browsing experience by bypassing cross-origin restrictions and enabling access to content from different domains.

Enhanced Web Browsing: Users can now easily view and interact with web content that would otherwise be restricted due to cross-origin policies. This extension ensures a smooth and uninterrupted browsing experience.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a simple and intuitive interface that allows users to effortlessly enable cross-domain access with just a few clicks.

Customizable Settings: Users have the option to customize the extension's settings to suit their preferences and tailor the cross-domain access according to their specific needs.
